specifications.Finish: Chemical > Enzyme Enzymes treatment offers a remarkably soft hand-feel by gently breaking down the fibers’ surface, resulting in a smoother and cleaner texture. This treatment also reduces pilling and fuzz, enhancing the fabric’s durability and maintaining a clean appearance
specifications.Care Advice: Chemical > Enzyme Piece printing on enzyme/bio-washed fabric can cause staining. Therefore, please refrain from piece printing on this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not rub Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Recommended Use Jeans, Outer, Cargo Pants
